MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 12-JAN-2021 10:58.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich affecting properties in Jackson Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:50am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fuse at Jackson Avenue substation. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and have been monitoring the network to determine the reason for these. We believe that we now have a fault location and we will be progressing a permanent repair. In the meantime our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:46am on 12th January 2021
